what's my opinion about scrum that's a
funny one actually I like scrum because
it's it's so basic and I really like to

beginners tiny checklists and I need

and you do that and you can start living

that's why I like it but it's it's it
have also be it must be clear that this
is only the start of the process so you

or to think about where to direct it and
if you feel it's not matching our
context I personally feel you should be
allowed to adapt it if you stick to the
anti principles so I think it's a great

flourish on the red but it's something
that needs to evolve over along the

it's not weeks it's not like you start
with from two weeks okay we are fine

the question before also for scrum you
